text: The men's pole vault event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 15 and 17 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Dmitry Starodubtsev ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Germán Chiaraviglio ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Liu Feiliang ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 17 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
